articles.title: Covid-19 vaccine: Latest updates on Oxford, Moderna and Pfizer breakthroughs - and who will get it first? - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Your guide to the latest developments in the race to a Covid-19 vaccine
articles.content:
Pfizer's jab relies on a live piece of genetic code which must be kept at -70C, making it less convenient and more expensive than Oxford's traditional vaccine. 
The vaccine was approved on December … [+4772 chars]
